Params: {3: 'The continuous ringing in your ear finally stops. Before you is a strange but familiar scene. At that moment, your ears are filled with more familiar sounds.'}
{2: '???', 3: "This place? This is the Virtual Horizon's internal system. Oh, this is the first time we're talking directly!"}
{2: '???', 3: "Don't you recognize me? I am Virtual Horizon's AI guide. By the way, you can also call me Ann. I chose this name myself."}
{2: 'Ann', 3: "Let's see, if we're conversing, taking on a human form is more appropriate, right?"}
{2: 'Ann', 3: 'I seem to have slept for a long time, yet it feels like only an instant. The only thing I remember is that I want to help you—the commandant...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Looks like you really have no idea.', 3: '23'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: 'Usually I can only perceive you through your voice, but why can I see you here now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: "But it doesn't matter. Let's begin the missions.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wait, we need to get outta here first.', 3: '43'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: "Shouldn't you be happy that you can always carry out your favorite battles here?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: 'The purpose of "Virtual Horizon" is to train a commandant\'s skills in battle for them to conquer the entire world.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I don't want to conquer the world...", 3: '36'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: "But this is everyone's wish in the ARU. It is the sole purpose of my existence...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No, there must be another purpose or way for you.', 3: '38'}
{3: 'Suddenly, a black data stream bursts out of Ann.'}
